item.description:
I just went on a whalewatch with Boston Harbor Cruises and this photo is from that cruise, it was fun! Please join me for their Historic Boston Sightseeing Cruise. It is strongly recommended that you buy your ticket in advance ($22). You need to line up, with your ticket, at least half an hour before the cruise departs (it departs at 3 pm). Bring your camera!

Description: Discover the historic and contemporary milestones of Boston’s inner and outer harbors during this fun, informative, fully narrated 90-minute tour. From the hero tales of the Revolutionary War to the local legends of the sea, you’ll be entertained and enthralled. Other highlights you’ll see include the nation’s oldest continuously manned lighthouse, the Harbor Islands National Park Area, Boston’s working port and examples of extravagant waterfront living.

http://www.bostonharb...
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture, will have a Meetup button on me somewhere, and will be in line by 2:30 pm
item.name: Historic Boston Sightseeing Cruise
